full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB DBANG THANG STONG RGYAL PO LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES ZAB LAM BLA MA LHA YI RNAL 'BYOR 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES SHU HU YA MON GYI SAS SDE CHEN PO PE SE DMAG ZOR HVOR CHE NAS BSKUL MA BYUNG BA BZHIN, KHU RAL CHEN MO'I YONGS 'DZIN MKHAN PO NO MONG DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GIS DAM PA GONG MA'I GSUNG LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
